title: What are some K-pop songs that you can relate to? - Quora

response.answer_text: I wanna be me me me...  This is a type of a song that girls like me can read ourselves through it. People who can't get what im telling: If you ever heard things like "oh you can't do this.. You can't do that.. That's boy thing..your a girl..bla bla bla" then, you know what I'm talking about. Wannabe is my most favo song in 2020 ( step a side haters ) I just love the lyrices, music and specially eye surprising MV. Also talking about lyrics These are my favo parts. Stop with the nagging, I'll take care of it No matter what I become I'll take care of it (This is kinda my mind) I do what I wanna Whether I live a normal life or not, just leave it to me I'll live my own life, because this life is mine (Self love) I'm so bad bad, I just wanna be selfish It's a hundred times better than being hurt pretending to be nice I'm just on my way, don't meddle in I might just tell you to be better youself Whatever people say, I'm me I just wanna be me I wanna be me, me, me (True, true, true) There's no need to be something I'm the best when I'm myself I wanna be me, me, me I don't wanna be somebody Just wanna be me, be me I wanna be me, me, me Ryujin: , everybody, everybody teachin' me (All eyes on me) Everybody says do this and that (Don't touch me) Ah yeah, yeah yeah yeah yeah I'll take care of myself I'mma do my thang, just do your thing 'Cause I'm the one and only Yeji: People like to talk about others (Lalala) Why do they care so about other people's lives (Lalala) Yuna: Sorry but mind your own business It's none of your business I do my own business _______________________________________________ Simply Can't help your needs because I'm on my way ( just thoughts 😁)

For me I would say BBIBBI by IU I will put some of the lyrics down below and why they relate to me Beyond this line, it’s an invasion Beep(Oh Oh) This is before everything happens, before they invade my privacy, before they annoy me, before they cross the line in general. I am warning them about it and if they don’t listen they will get a mental Yellow Card. Back Off Back Off As a introvert who doesn’t like many crowds and people I want everyone to back off and just stay a certain distance. In my school most people are very childish, silly and are manly all extroverted and they like to ‘playfully hit’ each other, yes that includes handshakes, high fives and fist bumps. Even though it doesn’t hurt I still hate it when people touch me, so I just want them to back off. Yellow C.A.R.D This is sort of like Back Off Back Off but like what happens after if they don’t go away. If they don’t go away I mentally give them a Yellow Card/Warning that if they do something else wrong or do it again then I will acquaintance them(Thats my line don’t steal it) Why do you like clothes like that? I care about my self image and even though nobody says it out loud, I feel as though they are judging me by my looks/clothes. “Why do you wear clothes like that,” is what they are thinking about me. Hello Stupi I.D They are stupid for doing this, they have crossed the line and since they have already gotten a few yellow cards already I give them a red card. They are out, they aren’t my friend anymore they are just my acquaintance. I won’t hang out with them as much and find new friends that won’t make the same mistake again. It’s too late for them to turn back now, just like at the end of the MV the curtains turn from yellow to red. Sometimes if this happens to you will takes a few years, mine took 6 years. My friendship just ended for me a few days ago. She said, “You(Not me) are skinny, I am skinny, but you(me) are…ehhh. Well at least I didn’t call you fat.” I am not considering her as my best friend anymore but I am still pretending to be her best friend because then I would have to give her up to my enemy. Listen to BBIBBI by IU it’s a great song in my opinion and you should check it out
